p: At such an early phase of the COVID-19 pandemic, it is difficult to accurately describe the populations most at risk, especially when teasing out risk factors for infection from risk factors for death from disease. Early on, it became clear that those who have visited the Wuhan wet market were most at risk of infection, but the population visiting the market is not an accurate reflection of the general population. The Chinese CDC published the epidemiologic characteristics of the COVID-19 outbreak along with associated risk factors for death [ 26].
